name: 加布里埃尔·伊格莱西亚斯 Gabriel Iglesias
intro: Gabriel "Fluffy" Iglesias' style of comedy is a mixture of story telling with characters and sound effects that bring all his personal issues to life. His amazing ability to cross over with a clean animated style of comedy has put him in big demand throughout the stand-up comedy circuit. Ask anyone who has seen him in concert and you will probably hear the same thing, "He was so funny!" FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/fluffyguy TWITTER: http://twitter.com/fluffyguy GOOGLE+: http://gplus.to/fluffyguy TUMBLR: http://gabrieliglesias.tumblr.com WEBSITE: http://fluffyguy.com WEBSTORE: http://fluffyshop.com
birthplace: 美国,加利福尼亚,圣地亚哥
